archimate:Device.name: Point of Sale Solution (POS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Core POS Terminal Specifications:
• Processor Type: o Intel Core i5 or equivalent ARM-based POS processor. • Memory Capacity: o 8 GB RAM minimum. • Storage Capacity: o 256 GB SSD. • Display Size and Resolution: o 15 inches touchscreen, Full HD (1920x1080). • Connectivity Options: o Gigabit Ethernet o Wi-Fi o Bluetooth 5.1+ for peripherals. • Operating System: o Windows 11 IoT/Pro configured for secure POS • Security Features: o TPM 2.0 encryption, PCI-DSS compliant o End-to-end transaction encryption o Biometric, RFID, or secure PIN authentication o Remote management and updates capability. • Port Availability: o USB-A (x4 minimum) o USB-C (x1) o Ethernet RJ45 o HDMI/DisplayPort for secondary display o Audio jack. • Protective Equipment: o Spill-resistant casing, durable mounting, privacy screen. Essential POS Peripherals:
1. Receipt Printer
• Type: Thermal receipt printer (fast, quiet) • Connectivity: USB/Ethernet • Print Speed: Minimum 200 mm/sec • Features: Auto-cutter, easy paper loading • Protective Equipment: Spill-resistant cover, robust chassis.
2. Barcode Scanner
• Type: 2D imager (supports QR codes, product barcodes) • Connectivity: Wired USB or wireless Bluetooth • Form Factor: Handheld or presentation style • Durability: IP54+ rating, drop-resistant • Features: High-speed scanning, omnidirectional capability • Protective Equipment: Ruggedized casing, anti-slip grip.
3. Cash Drawer
• Type: Secure, heavy-duty cash drawer • Connectivity: Interface via receipt printer (RJ11 or USB trigger) • Compartments: Bill (4–5 compartments), coin (4–5 compartments), lockable • Security: Manual lock override, sturdy metal housing.
4. Payment Card Reader
• Types of Payments Supported: o EMV Chip o NFC (Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay) o Magnetic stripe (legacy support) • Connectivity: USB or Bluetooth encrypted connection • Security: PCI-DSS certified, encrypted transactions, tamper-proof casing.
5. Customer Display
• Type: Secondary customer-facing display (pole-mounted or integrated) • Size and Resolution: 10 inches, Full HD or minimum 1024x768 • Connectivity: HDMI/USB • Features: Display transaction details clearly, promotional messaging capabilities • Protective Equipment: Sturdy, adjustable mounting.
6. PIN Pad ( if integrated card reader lacks PIN entry)
• Type: Encrypted PIN pad for secure PIN entry • Connectivity: USB or encrypted Bluetooth • Security: PCI-PED certified, tamper-resistant • Durability: Rugged, spill-resistant keypad.
7. Label Printer Type: Thermal label printer
• Connectivity: USB/Ethernet • Resolution: 300 dpi minimum • Media Compatibility: Labels, stickers (varied sizes, patient-specific labeling).
Recommended Accessories:
• Keyboard & Mouse: o Compact spill-resistant keyboard and mouse for administrative input. • POS Software: o Fully compatible with hospital ERP, EMR/EHR, Pharmacy systems, inventory management platforms (e.g., NetSuite), and secure payment processing gateways. Exposure to API specification and documentation. • Surge Protector and UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supply): o Ensures operational continuity during power interruptions and prevents data loss or hardware damage.
